item.title: Transfer Mapping: Enhancing Loggers for Better Transparency
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: What is a Logger, and Why Does It Matter? A logger is a fundamental component of modern software systems, designed to record system events, user actions, and issues in real-time.
